vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.18.19;
son of: Barzillai (H1271H); married to Merab (H4764)
§ Adriel = "flock of God"
son of Barzillai, and the man to whom Saul gave his daughter Merab in marriage although she was already promised to David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hombre de Abel-meholá; marido de Merab, hija del rey Saúl
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞得列 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "神的群眾"
巴西萊的兒子, 掃羅將其女兒米拉嫁給他為妻, 雖然之先掃羅已應許
了米拉和大衛的婚約
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚得列 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "神的群众"
巴西莱的儿子, 扫罗将其女儿米拉嫁给他为妻, 虽然之先扫罗已应许
了米拉和大卫的婚约
